blogPost.excerpt: Stackby is a collaborative workspace that brings ease of use of spreadsheets, functionality of databases and access to popular services via no-code API connectors - to create, organize and automate anything.
blogPost.body: Stackby is a collaborative workspace that brings ease of use of spreadsheets, functionality of databases and access to popular services via no-code API connectors - to create, organize and automate anything.
blogPost.title: Stackby - Spreadsheet, databases, and no-code APIs in one platform
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Stackby是一个协作式工作空间，它带来了电子表格的易用性、数据库的功能以及通过无代码API连接器对流行服务的访问--以创建、组织和自动化任何东西。
localize.tagline: 在一个平台上提供电子表格、数据库和无代码API。

localize.description: Stackby是一個協作式工作空間，它帶來了電子表格的易用性、數據庫的功能以及通過無代碼API連接器對流行服務的訪問--以創建、組織和自動化任何東西。
localize.tagline: 在一個平臺上提供電子表格、數據庫和無代碼API。

previous.excerpt: Vantage is a cloud cost transparency platform currently supporting AWS. Securely link your AWS account in a click of a button and we'll automatically show you where your costs are coming from and how they're trending.
previous.title: Vantage - A cloud cost transparency platform

localize.description: Vantage是一个云成本透明平台，目前支持AWS。只需点击一个按钮，就能安全地链接你的AWS账户，我们会自动向你展示你的成本来自哪里，以及成本的趋势。
Vantage是一個雲成本透明平臺，目前支持AWS。只需點擊一個按鈕，就能安全地鏈接你的AWS賬戶，我們會自動向你展示你的成本來自哪裏，以及成本的趨勢。

next.excerpt: Alpaca offers the world’s first commission-free fractional trading API to allow us to build more flexible quant trading models and fintech apps.
next.title: Alpaca Fractional Trading API - Commission-free API to trade & invest for as little as $1

localize.description: Alpaca提供了全球首个免佣金的零碎交易API，让我们可以建立更灵活的量化交易模型和金融科技应用。
localize.tagline: 免佣金的API，交易和投资的价格仅为1美元

localize.description: Alpaca提供了全球首個免佣金的零碎交易API，讓我們可以建立更靈活的量化交易模型和金融科技應用。
localize.tagline: 免佣金的API，交易和投資的價格僅爲1美元
